articles.title: Biden Backs Extending Gaza Ceasefire After Hamas Frees More Hostages - NDTV
articles.description: Hamas released a third group of hostages including a four-year-old American girl Sunday, in exchange for Palestinian prisoners on day three of a truce which a source close to the Hamas said they were willing to prolong.
articles.content:
A source close to Hamas said the group was willing to prolong the pause.

articles.author: By Chris Lau, Ivana Kottasová, Sophie Tanno, Antoinette Radford and Maureen Chowdhury, CNN
articles.title: Hamas releases third group of hostages during truce with Israel: Live updates - CNN
articles.description: A third set of hostages was released by Hamas on Sunday, including the first American to be successfully freed, according to Israeli and US officials. Follow for live updates.
articles.content:
Another 17 hostages held in Gaza have been released on Sunday, the third such handover during a four-day truce between Israel and Hamas.

articles.title: NASA Laser Communication Test Gets Data from 16 Million Kilometers Away - VOA Learning English
articles.description: NASA says a test involving a laser-based communication method successfully sent data over 16 million kilometers through deep space. The new system is expected to replace radio links long used by the American space agency.
articles.content: NASA has successfully tested a laser-based communication method that sent data over 16 million kilometers. The American space agency hopes the system will greatly improve data links between Earth and… [+4034 chars]

articles.description: A California couple are claiming their canine recovered from a potentially deadly disease after being treated with a lifesaving antibiotic.
